original_text: I will be as the dew unto Israel: he shall grow as the lily, and cast forth his roots as Lebanon.
korean_text: 내가 이스라엘에게 이슬과 같으리니 그가 백합화 같이 피겠고 레바논 백향목 같이 뿌리가 박힐 것이라

sentences.original_text: I will be as the dew unto Israel:
he shall grow as the lily,
and cast forth his roots as Lebanon.
